CustomField.formula:
Case(Main_Activity__c,
"Internal", "Internal",
"Interntid", "Internal",
"India", IF((Billable_Time__c)>0,"Billable time India Consultants","None billable time India Consultants"),
IF((Billable_Time__c)>0,"Billable time Consultants","None billable time Consultants")
)
CustomField.label: Time on Customer
